article.Heading: KEC Intnl up 5%, Rail Budget proposes electrification of 2000 Km
article.Summary: Shares of KEC International rose 5 percent intraday on Thursday. Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu has announced electrification of 2000 km. While laying down proposals for railways in FY17, the minister has said that the government is planning to set up a new fund for financing projects annualised savings of Rs 3000 crore to be achieved in FY17.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of KEC International rose 5 percent intraday on Thursday. Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu has announced electrification of 2000 km. While laying down proposals for railways in FY17, the minister has said that the government is planning to set up a new fund for financing projects annualised savings of Rs 3000 crore to be achieved in FY17.

At 12:50 hrs KEC International was quoting at Rs 108.00, up Rs 5.20, or 5.06 percent on the BSE.
